title: Multifunctional Traveler Speakers - The Harman Kardon 'Traveler' Speaker Has an Elegant Form (TrendHunter.com)
text:
The Harman Kardon 'Traveler' speaker is a multifunctional audio accessory perfect for jet setters and avid mobile users alike to help them stay connected no matter where their next adventure takes them.
The unit features a sleek form factor that draws on the design language of the tech brand and is capable of pumping out rich, high-quality audio at leisure. The speaker is rated to provide up to 10-hours of playback per charge, but also functions as a power bank to help listeners power up their smartphone, if desired.
The Harman Kardon 'Traveler' speaker has been designed by Sunghyun (Teddy) Hwang, and comes in black, silver and electric blue finish options. Paired with a premium carrying pouch, the speaker will match existing technology products seamlessly.
